basic.blooming: Flowering period June-September, fruiting period September-December
basic.color: Flower color white with light pink

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, also resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
